thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 25 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Varengold Bank: Capital Increase - New Shares Completely Issued

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Varengold Bank: Capital Increase - New Shares Completely Issued
text:
Jan 25 (Reuters) - VARENGOLD BANK AG:
* DGAP-NEWS: VARENGOLD BANK AG: CAPITAL INCREASE - NEW SHARES COMPLETELY ISSUED
* ALL SHARES WERE PLACED AT AN ISSUE PRICE OF EUR 2.80 PER SHARE
* 513,441 SHARES WERE TAKEN UP BY EXISTING SHAREHOLDERS IN PUBLIC RIGHTS OFFERING
* SHARE CAPITAL WILL BE INCREASED BY EUR 2.07 MILLION TO EUR 6.21 MILLION BY ISSUING 2.07 MILLION NEW SHARES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
